Game.Name: Buffy the Vampire Slayer - Wrath of the Darkhul King (USA, Europe)
Game.plot: Years ago, the Darkhul King was banished to a hidden dimension. But somehow he has found his way back to Earth, and now he's ready to unleash his powers on the unsuspecting public of Sunnydale. Of course, Sunnydale is also the home of the one and only Buffy. Using her experience against the many monsters, and her amazing strength and fighting techniques, your job is to guide her along through each level and defeat the many vampires and other evil beings before taking on the prime evil, the Darkhul King itself.Cheat: Invincibility, Infinate lifes and 9 of everythingAt the main Press Start screen press
Game.Notes: The stakes are high as players assume the role of the world's most fetching foe of the forces of darkness in THQ's Buffy the Vampire Slayer: Wrath of the Darkhul King on Game Boy Advance. Buffy hunts loathsome legions through 16 twilit levels before confronting the ultimate evil in the form of the Darkhul King. This side-scroller is crammed with interactive environments -- a fancy phrase meaning you get to break lots of stuff, like doors, crates, spider webs, vases, benches and even stone walls.
